item.title: A_short_note_on_black_scholes
item.description: A short note on classical Black-Scholes, and the construction of a locally risk-less portfolio, that does not have a driving $dW$ term (aka dynamic hedging). [A short note on Black-Scholes](./../../../../A short note on Black Scholes.pdf)
